001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.KeyDeserializer;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidFormatException;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.AddressParser;
009import org.bitcoinj.base.DefaultAddressParser;
010import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
011import org.bitcoinj.base.exceptions.AddressFormatException;
012import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
013
014import java.io.IOException;
015
016/**
017 * Key Deserializer to support using Address as the key in a Map.
018 */
019public class AddressKeyDeserializer extends KeyDeserializer {
020    private final AddressParser.Strict addressParser;
021
022    /**
023     * Construct an address deserializer that will deserialize addresses for the default supported networks.
024     * See {@link NetworkParameters} to understand what the supported networks are.
025     */
026    public AddressKeyDeserializer() {
027        this((s) -> new DefaultAddressParser().parseAddressAnyNetwork(s));
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * Construct an address KeyDeserializer with a custom {@link AddressParser}
032     * @param addressParser parser to convert a string to an address
033     */
034    public AddressKeyDeserializer(AddressParser.Strict addressParser) {
035        this.addressParser = addressParser;
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * Construct an address KeyDeserializer that validates addresses for the specified {@link NetworkParameters}.
040     * When deserializing addresses, addresses that are not from the specified network will cause a
041     * {@link InvalidFormatException} to be thrown during deserialization.
042     *
043     * @param network specify the only network we will deserialize addresses for.
044     */
045    public AddressKeyDeserializer(Network network) {
046        this( (network != null)
047                ? (s) -> new DefaultAddressParser().parseAddress(s, network)
048                : (s) -> new DefaultAddressParser().parseAddressAnyNetwork(s));
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * @deprecated use {@link #AddressKeyDeserializer(Network)}
053     */
054    @Deprecated
055    public AddressKeyDeserializer(NetworkParameters netParams) {
056        this(netParams.network());
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public Object deserializeKey(String key, DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
061        try {
062            return addressParser.parseAddress(key);
063        } catch (AddressFormatException afe) {
064            throw new InvalidFormatException(ctxt.getParser(), "Invalid Address: " + key, key, Address.class);
065        }
066    }
067}
